Synopsis: 
-------------- 
'Death Race 2' will take place in the very near future, when the U.S. economy begins to decline and violent crime began to spiral out of control. To contain the prison population, establishing a series of private prisons, ruled by gangs, cold-blooded murderers and sociopaths. The worst of these prisons is Terminal Island, where convicted for the murder of policemen arrives Carl Lucas, who is the real protagonist of the latest reality show Death Race. The winner, if someone manages to survive, has the prize of freedom. 

Production notes: 
-------------------------------- 
Film prequel Paul W.S. Anderson, based in turn on the cult classic Roger Corman. The tape will come directly to DVD and Blu-Ray.
